title: Booker T Washington National Monument: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore          Eastern National Graphic Eastern National   Â   Eastern National BookstoreThe bookstore, located in the park visitor center, stocks titles for adults and children on Booker T. Washington, African American History, 19th century folk ways, Virginia, and the National Park Service.  It also carries nature guides and theme related audio/visual products and souvenirs.  Eastern National is a non-profit cooperating association that supports interpretive, research, and publication activities in the National Park Service.
